text: Display the highest house price  in HaNoi city
sql: SELECT 'max(price)' FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'HaNoi';

text: Display the lowest house price  in HoChiMinh city
sql: SELECT 'min(price)' FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'HoChiMinh';

text: Display the average house price  in HaNoi city
sql: SELECT avg(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'HaNoi';

text: Show the highest house price  in HaNoi city
sql: SELECT max(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'HaNoi';

text: Show the average house price  in DaNang city
sql: SELECT avg(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'DaNang';

text: Show the average house price in LongBien district, HaNoi city
sql: SELECT avg(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'HaNoi' AND 'district' LIKE 'LongBien';

text: Show the max house's price in TayHo district, HaNoi city
sql: SELECT max(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'HaNoi' AND 'district' LIKE 'LongBien';

text: Show the mininum house's price in Quan1 district, HoChiMinh city
sql: SELECT min(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'HaNoi' AND 'district' LIKE 'LongBien';

text: Display the avg house price in HoangMai district, HaNoi City in quarter 3, 2021
sql: SELECT avg(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'HaNoi' AND 'district' LIKE 'HoangMai' AND 'quarter' == 3 AND 'year' == 2021 ;

text: Display the highest house price with 2 rooms in LienChieu district, DaNang City in quarter 2, 2020
sql: SELECT max(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'DaNang' AND 'district' LIKE 'LienChieu' AND 'quarter' == 2 AND 'year'== 2020  AND 'rooms' == 2 ;

text: Show the average price of 2 rooms-house in HoChiMinh City in this year
sql: SELECT avg(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'HoChiMinh' AND 'year'== 2021 AND 'rooms' == 3 ;

text: I want to display the avg price in DaNang city with 2 rooms house
sql: SELECT avg(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'DaNang' AND 'rooms' == 2 ;

text: Show the highest price of 3 rooms house in DongDa district, HaNoi city in 2021
sql: SELECT max(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'HaNoi' AND 'district' LIKE 'DongDa' AND 'rooms' == 3 AND 'year' == 2021 ;

text: Display maximum house's price with 1 rooms in CanTho city, in quarter 4, 2019
sql: SELECT max(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'CanTho' AND 'quarter' == 4 AND 'year' == 2019 AND 'rooms' == 1 ;

text: Tell the avg price housing in HaTinh city, 2021
sql: SELECT avg(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'HaTinh' AND 'year' == 2021 ;

text: show the avg house's price in BinhDuong, 2020 with 4 rooms
sql: SELECT avg(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'BinhDuong' AND 'year' == 2020 AND 'rooms' == 4 ;

text: Display the avg apartment's price in HaNoi city, 2021
sql: SELECT 'avg(price)' FROM 'house' WHERE 'type' LIKE 'apartment' AND city' LIKE 'HaNoi';

text: Show the highest flat's price  in HoChiMinh city
sql: SELECT 'max(price)' FROM 'house' WHERE type = 'apartment' AND 'city' LIKE 'HoChiMinh';

text: Show the highest apartment's price  in DaNang city
sql: SELECT 'max(price)' FROM 'house' WHERE type = 'apartment' AND 'city' LIKE 'DaNang';

text: Show the highest landhouse's price  in HoChiMinh city
sql: SELECT 'max(price)' FROM 'house' WHERE type = 'landhouse' AND 'city' LIKE 'HoChiMinh';

text: show the avg land house's price in BinhDuong, 2020 with 4 rooms
sql: SELECT avg(price) FROM 'house' WHERE 'city' LIKE 'BinhDuong' AND 'rooms' == 4 AND 'type'== 'landhouse' AND 'year' = 2020;
